front.title: Link Management Protocol Extensions for Grid Property Negotiation

abstract.t: The recent updated version of ITU-T [G.694.1] has introduced theflexible-grid DWDM technique, which provides a new tool that operatorscan implement to provide a higher degree of network optimization thanis possible with fixed-grid systems. This document describes theextensions to the Link Management Protocol (LMP) to negotiate link gridproperty between the adjacent DWDM nodes before the link is brought up.
